Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Bladder and Prostate Cancer Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To identify clinically relevant genetic variants in bladder and prostate cancer by next-generation sequencing.
Container: Sterile container suitable for tumor tissue/cell specimens (e.g., biopsy container or microcentrifuge tube)
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher platform)
